summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ContentFactory app. All UI components, navigation, and backend APIs working correctly. X AI module fully functional with all 4 tabs. Placeholder modules load properly. Only missing OpenAI API key (expected - user will add).

configuration_issues.note: Expected - user will add their own API key

minor_issues.issue: Console warning about missing Description for DialogContent
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact, just console warning

passed_tests: X AI module with 4 tabs (Tweet, Quote, Reply, Article)
Tweet tab: mode toggle, input, length selectors, variant counter, advanced settings
Quote tab: URL input, fetch button, tweet preview
Reply tab: URL input, fetch button, reply modes
Article tab: title/topic inputs, style/language selectors, reference links
All placeholder pages (YouTubeAI, InstaFlow, TikTrend, LinkShareAI, Blog Architect)
action_item_for_main_agent: User needs to add OPENAI_API_KEY to /app/backend/.env file to enable content generation. All other functionality is working perfectly. Optional: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent component to remove console warning.
